title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies Through Role-Play-Based Work Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers. This scenario-based role-playing process cultivates mathematical problem-solving skills by reflecting real work environments. Learners simulate realistic tasks from administrative/managerial roles in teams.

learning_goals: Learners can solve workplace mathematical problems (budget allocation, risk analysis, etc.) with over 80% accuracy via role-play simulations.
Through team-based role-play, learners can effectively apply conflict management and negotiation to mathematical problem-solving processes with over 70% success.
Through reflective journaling, insights derived from simulation experiences can be applied to actual work tasks at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
